why: An android app to add friends, and push notification on your social status at a set region
storyParas: Sem 3 Software Engg project - Social Me
Letting your friend circle know(except some pesky once) on whats on your mind
Set a region as social region and when you come in vincinity of that region, your status is shared as a push notification to your circle
Developed this one as an organic new idea with major contribution from Sushrut Diwan as academic SE1 project - courtesy Dr. Mike Siok
Had fun learning React and programming for android(and css)
